channel.title: [pi] adding custom crowns.[solved]
channel.description: im using toms cache suite, but every time mod icons and i compile then run my server it never lets me log on. so i use my back up of my server and it logs in straight away. i dont know what the problem is. could someone help me please?

item.title: [pi] adding custom crowns.[solved]
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Add them through the client files
change int modIcons = new int[3] or whatever to a a higher number, and add the crowns with the others as well

Read full topic
